name: Lost in space (itch) (Ravengar)
description:
You are an astronaut, but after the explosion of a planet next to your space station you are in danger. You must join your ship to escape from here. But you're jetpack is break and is activated at regular interval without your action. To stay on a ground you got a special ball that you can drop to try to land again after a take-off.

===========================================================
